sentences.sContent: Doctors are encouraged to defer to experts.
sentences.sCn: 鼓励医生们听从专家的意见。

remMethod.val: de(下降) + fer(带来) → 来得慢 → 拖延， 推迟

words.tran: 推迟（defer的过去式及过去分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 遵从， 听从， 服从
trans.tranOther: If you defer to someone, you accept their opinion or do what they want you to do, even when you do not agree with it yourself, because you respect them or their authority
to delay something until a later date
